ESP.ORIGINAL:
[pagebreak]

R I F T E N Home Decorating Guide

[pagebreak]

Welcome to your new home! This decorating guide provides a list of packages that you can purchase from the Steward of the hold. Each package contains furnishings and decor for a specific part of your house, and these will be delivered and placed for you upon purchase. All you need to do is provide the gold, and the Steward will take care of the rest. The next time that you visit your home after making your purchases, you will see your new decorations and furnishings in place. Kitchen This package will provide furnishings and decor for your kitchen, which is the room immediately beyond your home's front door. This includes the lighting of the fire. Bedroom Adds bedside tables, a dresser and a small table with two chairs to the master bedroom. This also includes an upgrade to the bed itself. Alchemy Laboratory This package will place an alchemy crafting table in your basement, along with some shelves and other decor. Enchanting Laboratory This package will place an item enchanting table in your basement, along with some shelves and other decor. Also includes a few practice dummies to test your new enchantments on. Children's Bedroom Adds a comfortable child's bedroom to your cellar, including two beds, a wardrobe, dresser, play area, and wall hangings. If you have previously purchased the Enchanting Laboratory, these furnishings will replace it (and vice-versa). Garden When you purchase this package, the small patch of land adjacent to your house will be planted with a wide range of herbs, vegetables and other plants native to Skyrim.

[pagebreak]

R I F T E N Home Decorating Guide

[pagebreak]

Welcome to your new home! This decorating guide provides a list of packages that you can purchase from the Steward of the hold. Each package contains furnishings and decor for a specific part of your house, and these will be delivered and placed for you upon purchase. All you need to do is provide the gold, and the Steward will take care of the rest. The next time that you visit your home after making your purchases, you will see your new decorations and furnishings in place. Kitchen This package will provide furnishings and decor for your kitchen, which is the room immediately beyond your home's front door. This includes the lighting of the fire. Bedroom Adds bedside tables, a dresser and a small table with two chairs to the master bedroom. This also includes an upgrade to the bed itself. Alchemy Laboratory This package will place an alchemy crafting table in your basement, along with some shelves and other decor. Enchanting Laboratory This package will place an item enchanting table in your basement, along with some shelves and other decor. Also includes a few practice dummies to test your new enchantments on. Children's Bedroom Adds a comfortable child's bedroom to your cellar, including two beds, a wardrobe, dresser, play area, and wall hangings. If you have previously purchased the Enchanting Laboratory, these furnishings will replace it (and vice-versa). Garden When you purchase this package, the small patch of land adjacent to your house will be planted with a wide range of herbs, vegetables and other plants native to Skyrim.
You have chosen to reset Dungeon Darkness lighting back to vanilla for all dungeons. This will take approximately 30-60 seconds per dungeon. Are you sure?

*** Location Overrides - Default Locations *** Probabilities for unoccupied zones:
Fire: %.0f%% Candle: %.0f%% Dwemer: %.0f%% Candle Clutter: %.0f%% Candle has Candle: %.0f%%
Choose selection on left. Then adjust values.
The cell you are entering has no location defined. Would you like to run the lighting scan to remove lights in this cell?
Select the type of location type for the scan:
Default location types (Any not listed below)
Cancel - do not run manual scan

*** Location Overrides - Caves *** Probabilities for unoccupied zones:
Fire: %.0f%% Candle: %.0f%% Dwemer: %.0f%% Candle Clutter: %.0f%% Candle has Candle: %.0f%%
Choose selection on left. Then adjust values.

*** Location Overrides - Dwarven Ruins *** Probabilities for unoccupied zones:
Fire: %.0f%% Candle: %.0f%% Dwemer: %.0f%% Candle Clutter: %.0f%% Candle has Candle: %.0f%%
Choose selection on left. Then adjust values.

*** Location Overrides - Nordic Ruins *** Probabilities for unoccupied zones:
Fire: %.0f%% Candle: %.0f%% Dwemer: %.0f%% Candle Clutter: %.0f%% Candle has Candle: %.0f%%
Choose selection on left. Then adjust values.

***Actor Overrides - Default (Human) NPCs *** Probabilities of using the following light types:
Fire: %.0f%% Candle: %.0f%% Dwemer: %.0f%%
Choose selection on left. Then adjust values.

***Actor Overrides - Draugr *** Probabilities of using the following light types:
Fire: %.0f%% Candle: %.0f%% Dwemer: %.0f%%
Choose selection on left. Then adjust values.

***Actor Overrides - Dwarven Automatons *** Probabilities for unoccupied zones:
Fire: %.0f%% Candle: %.0f%% Dwemer: %.0f%%
Choose selection on left. Then adjust values.

***Actor Overrides - Falmer *** Probabilities for unoccupied zones:
Fire: %.0f%% Candle: %.0f%% Dwemer: %.0f%%
Choose selection on left. Then adjust values.

***Actor Overrides - Hagraven *** Probabilities for unoccupied zones:
Fire: %.0f%% Candle: %.0f%% Dwemer: %.0f%%
Choose selection on left. Then adjust values.

***Actor Overrides - Riekling *** Probabilities for unoccupied zones:
Fire: %.0f%% Candle: %.0f%% Dwemer: %.0f%%
Choose selection on left. Then adjust values.

***Actor Overrides - Vampires *** Probabilities for unoccupied zones:
Fire: %.0f%% Candle: %.0f%% Dwemer: %.0f%%
Choose selection on left. Then adjust values.

***Torch to Light *** Require equiped torch to light fires or candles using activate method.
REQUIRED - Torch is required to be equiped NOT REQUIRED - Torch is not required to be equiped

General Configuration (buttons show the current setting - click to toggle)
Mod Enabled: Mod is enabled or disabled Fadeout: Do the fadeout on entering a dungeon Dwarven Ruins: Run scans in Dwarven Ruins Missing Keyword Prompt: Enable if mod added dungeons aren't scanning

Set the NPC Scan Distance
Determines the radius of occupied zone from each NPC. Sets the distance from which an NPC will maintain a light (if the NPC uses the light).
Xtra Short - Hard-core dark Short - Fairly dark Medium (Default - recommended) Long - Milk-Drinker

Select from the following presets (the button shows the active preset):
Milk-Drinker - Most lighting Lore-Drinker - Darker but dwarven automatons and drauger maintain their lights Realistic Dark - Recommended Hardcore Dark - Least lighting - NPCs huddle in darkness

*** Relighting Options ****
Sets whether or not you are able to light up fires, candles or dwemer lighting.

*** Mod Compatibility ****
Compatibility settings with other mods.

ESP.TRADUIT: Потушить источники света при входе в подземелье?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: self.AddToggleOptionST("OPTION_Fadeout", "Do fadeout on dungeon entry?", Options.doFadeout, 0)
self.AddToggleOptionST("OPTION_doDwemer", "Disable lights in Dwarven ruins?", Options.doDwemer, 0)

ESP.TRADUIT: Потушить источники света при входе в Двемерские руины?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: self.AddToggleOptionST("OPTION_doDwemer", "Disable lights in Dwarven ruins?", Options.doDwemer, 0)

ESP.TRADUIT: Предложить сканировать, если ключевое слово не найдено?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sets the probability that CANDLE lights in CAVE unoccupied zones will be left on. Set higher if unoccupied zones are too dark.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: self.SetInfoText("Sets the probability that CANDLE lights in CAVE unoccupied zones will be left on. Set higher if unoccupied zones are too dark.")

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sets the probability that CANDLE lights for HARGRAVEN actor types will be left on. Set higher if this Actor uses this light type.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: self.SetInfoText("Sets the probability that CANDLE lights for HARGRAVEN actor types will be left on. Set higher if this Actor uses this light type.")

ESP.ORIGINAL: Implements brief fade-out while nearby lights are being turned off. Minimizes chance you will see lights blink off
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: self.SetInfoText("Implements brief fade-out while nearby lights are being turned off. Minimizes chance you will see lights blink off")

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enables debug mode. Must also enable Papyrus debugging in Skyrim INI.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sets the probability that FIRE lights in CAVE unoccupied zones will be left on. Set higher if unoccupied zones are too dark.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Check if you have ELFX installed with Candle Smoke. This will remove ELFX candle smoke for candles that are disabled in the scan.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: self.SetInfoText("Check if you have ELFX installed with Candle Smoke. This will remove ELFX candle smoke for candles that are disabled in the scan.")

ESP.ORIGINAL: Will pause sneak tools fire lighting when in dungeons, eliminating conflict with DISDD (recommend if Fire Lighting is enabled).
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: self.SetInfoText("Will pause sneak tools fire lighting when in dungeons, eliminating conflict with DISDD (recommend if Fire Lighting is enabled).")

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lights within this distance from any detected NPC will not be disabled. Establishes lit areas around NPCs. The larger the number the slower the scan will run.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Presets. Milk Drinker - Generous lighting; Lore Drinker - you believe Drauger maintain lights and dwemer ruins are lit; Realistic Dark - Recommended for the realistic lighting experience; Hardcore Dark - NPCs huddle in the vast dark dungeons - don't expect much light; Custom - Set your own settings.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: self.SetInfoText("Presets. Milk Drinker - Generous lighting; Lore Drinker - you believe Drauger maintain lights and dwemer ruins are lit; Realistic Dark - Recommended for the realistic lighting experience; Hardcore Dark - NPCs huddle in the vast dark dungeons - don't expect much light; Custom - Set your own settings.")

ESP.ORIGINAL: Resets lights for all Dungeons on menu close. Expect this to take between 30 and 60 seconds per dungeon.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: self.SetInfoText("Resets lights for all Dungeons on menu close. Expect this to take between 30 and 60 seconds per dungeon.")
